titleStmt.title: Help in time of need from the God of help to the people of the (so called) Church of Scotland, especially the once more zealous and professing, who have so shamefully degenerated and declined from that which their fathers the primitive Protestants attained unto ... / writ by George Keith, prisoner for the truth in Aberdeen in the latter end of the year 1664.
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

titleStmt.title: Help in time of need from the God of help to the people of the (so called) Church of Scotland, especially the once more zealous and professing, who have so shamefully degenerated and declined from that which their fathers the primitive Protestants attained unto ... / writ by George Keith, prisoner for the truth in Aberdeen in the latter end of the year 1664.
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.
Jaffray, Alexander, 1614-1673.

notesStmt.note: T.p. cropped, imprint lacking. Imprint information supplied from Wing.
"Writ about the beginning of the 11 month in the year 1664": p. 75.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
